rules.title: Rental Rules & Terms
rules.subtitle: Please read our rental rules and terms carefully before booking
rules.identityVerificationDesc: Valid ID card or passport is required for all rentals. We will take a photo for security purposes.
rules.depositRequiredDesc: A deposit of 50% of the costume value is required. This will be refunded upon return of the costume in good condition.
rules.rentalPeriodDesc: Minimum rental period is 1 day. Return by 6:00 PM on the due date to avoid late fees.
rules.costumeCareDesc: Do not wash the costume. Return in the same condition as received. Minor wear is acceptable.
rules.lateFeesWarning: Please return costumes on time to avoid late fees
rules.agreement: By booking a costume, you agree to all the rules and terms above
rules.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us before booking

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Clover Cosplay! We are a premium cosplay costume rental service dedicated to bringing your favorite characters to life. This manual will guide you through all the features of our platform.

account.title: Getting Started
account.registerDesc: To rent a costume, you must first create an account. Click 'Register' at the top right, fill in your name, email, and password.
account.loginDesc: Access your account by clicking 'Login' and entering your registered email and password.

booking.title: How to Rent
booking.step1Desc: Use the 'Products' page to browse our collection. You can search by character name, anime title, or filter by category.
booking.step2Desc: On the product page, check the calendar to see if the costume is available for your desired dates.
booking.step3Desc: Select your start and end dates. The system will calculate the total price including deposit. Click 'Rent Now' to proceed.

payment.title: Payments & Verification
payment.instruction: After booking, you will be redirected to the payment page.
payment.bankDesc: Transfer the total amount to our bank account displayed on the screen.
payment.proofDesc: Take a screenshot of your transfer slip and upload it via the 'Upload Payment Proof' button. Our admin will verify it within 24 hours.

dashboard.title: Customer Dashboard
dashboard.myRentalsDesc: Track the status of all your bookings (Pending, Approved, Active, Completed).
dashboard.receiptsDesc: Once a booking is approved, you can download an official receipt directly from the booking details page.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, you can cancel up to 7 days before the rental date for a full refund.
faq.q2: What happens if I return late?
faq.a2: Late returns incur a fee of 50% of the daily rental price for the first 3 days.
faq.a3: Yes, the deposit is fully refundable upon returning the costume in good condition.

deposit.def: A refundable fee paid upfront to ensure the costume is returned in good condition.

rentalPeriod.def: The duration you keep the costume. Minimum 1 day. Late returns incur fees.

verification.def: The process of submitting your ID card/Passport to confirm your identity before renting.

proof.def: A screenshot or photo of your bank transfer slip used to confirm your payment.
